name: 3eltr4g
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wceq(c1, c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wceq(c1, c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c1, c3)
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))

comment: Substitution of equal classes into membership relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 23-Nov-2019.)
